member.name: CRYPT_TIMESTAMP_REQUEST
member.summary: The CRYPT_TIMESTAMP_REQUEST structure defines a time stamp request structure that corresponds to the Abstract Syntax Notation One (ASN.1) definition of a TimeStampReq type. The CRYPT_TIMESTAMP_REQUEST structure is used internally.

summary.para: A DWORD value that specifies the version of the time stamp request.
This member can be one of the following values.

member.name: CRYPT_TIMESTAMP_REQUEST.HashAlgorithm
member.summary: A structure that contains information about the algorithm used to calculate the hash.

member.name: CRYPT_TIMESTAMP_REQUEST.HashedMessage
member.summary: A structure that specifies the hash values to be time stamped.

member.name: CRYPT_TIMESTAMP_REQUEST.pszTSAPolicyId
member.summary: Optional. A pointer to a null-terminated string that specifies the Time Stamping Authority (TSA) policy under which the time stamp token should be provided.

member.name: CRYPT_TIMESTAMP_REQUEST.Nonce
member.summary: Optional. A CRYPT_INTEGER_BLOB structure that contains the nonce value used by the client to verify the timeliness of the response when no local clock is available.

member.name: CRYPT_TIMESTAMP_REQUEST.fCertReq
member.summary: A Boolean value that indicates whether the TSA must include the certificates used to sign the time stamp token in the response.

member.name: CRYPT_TIMESTAMP_REQUEST.cExtension
member.summary: The number of elements in the array pointed to by the rgExtension member.

member.name: CRYPT_TIMESTAMP_REQUEST.rgExtension
member.summary: A pointer to an array of structures that contain extension information that is passed in the request.
